metadata.name: Edith: Kotry's Build
metadata.description:
UNFINISHED! BE WARNED - unfinished unlocks.
hi
im releasing the repentance version of edith publicly, because i know it will just never surface if i dont rip the bandaid off. its a brave new world for this character, so everything is subject to change. - Lambchop
Hi, i'm Kotry, and i'm trying to fix and complete Lamb's Edith despite her pettitions to don't do that lol, i'm bored and just wanted to do this
